title: About Comptario
subtitle: We are an innovative tech company based in Albertville, France.

whoWeAre.title: Who are we?
whoWeAre.text: Comptario is a dynamic technology company building modern, secure and easy-to-use bookkeeping software for small and medium businesses. Our headquarters is in Albertville, in the Auvergne–Rhône–Alpes region of France. We develop products with European-grade security, performance and data protection principles; we reflect transparency, simplicity and speed across the entire experience.

offerings.title: What do we offer?
items: A single workspace for invoicing, expense management, VAT and reports
Localized features like multi-currency and category-based VAT
PDF invoice generation, email delivery and archiving
Multi-tenant architecture, role-based access and plan limits

approach.title: Our approach
approach.text: We make product decisions with user feedback and data-driven metrics. Security and data privacy are not extras; they are core to our design. We operate on a reliable and scalable infrastructure compliant with EU data protection principles (GDPR).
